title: Global sulfur production by country 2019
yAxis: Price in U.S. dollars per ton
summary: This bar chart has 23 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Price in U.S. dollars per ton in each Country on the y axis.
The Price in U.S. dollars per ton is appeared to be the highest at Country China and lowest at Country Brazil.
